content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) waiting for source items
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) with no fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0) with no ingredients

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5) working
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) with no fuel
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5) not connected
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) empty
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5) with full output

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) empty
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) working
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5) working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have sufficient fuel to operate

### Errors due to lack of ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have sufficient ingredients to operate

### Errors due to not being connected to the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network to operate

### Errors due to pipe groups being empty
- Ensure that pipe groups are filled with fluid to operate

### Errors due to belt groups being empty
- Ensure that belt groups are filled with items to operate

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
